description: Turn bagels into a sweeter snack for the kids with this nutritionally approved recipe. This recipe can be made ahead and enjoyed whenever sweet cravings hit.
name: Cinnamon Bagel Crisps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Snacks,Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids,Kids snack
recipeIngredient: 4 Woolworths plain bagels, cut into 5mm-thick rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line two large baking trays with baking paper. Place bagel rounds, in a single layer, on trays.
Combine honey and 1 tbs warm water in a small bowl. Brush tops of bagel rounds with honey mixture, then sprinkle with cinnamon.
Bake bagels for 15 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve with yoghurt.
